mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (R_SEQ, M_SEQ, G_SEQ, R_CONTS, R_REGDATE, R_IMG, R_STAR, R_ANS, R_GUFLAG,R_MFLAG) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{m_seq}, #{g_seq}, #{r_conts},SYSDATE,#{r_img}, #{r_star},NULL,0,0)
mapper.select: select r.r_star,m.m_name,r.r_regdate,r.r_conts,r.r_img,r.r_ans from review r,Members m where r.g_seq=#{g_seq} and r.m_seq = m.m_seq
select g_seq, r_img from review where NOT r_img is NULL
select count(*) from review where r_star=1 and g_seq=#{g_seq}
select count(*) from review where r_star=2 and g_seq=#{g_seq}
select count(*) from review where r_star=3 and g_seq=#{g_seq}
select count(*) from review where r_star=4 and g_seq=#{g_seq}
select count(*) from review where r_star=5 and g_seq=#{g_seq}
select avg(r_star) from review where g_seq=#{g_seq}
SELECT * FROM REVIEW R , MEMBERS M, GOODS G, GUIDE GU WHERE R.M_SEQ=M.M_SEQ AND R.G_SEQ=G.G_SEQ AND R.R_GUFLAG = 0 AND G.GU_SEQ=GU.GU_SEQ AND G.GU_SEQ=#{gu_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET R_ANS=#{r_ans} , r_guflag=1 where r_seq=#{r_seq}
